price: (53) [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
